duties_responsibilities.duty: Follow all safety rules and regulations; wear PPE.
Read, understand and follow work instructions to produce product that meet standards.
Assist operators by performing the following: Cut Cores, Change Rolls, Follow Resin Lines, Understand and react to alarms.
Fill out all required paperwork and labels.
Perform timely and thorough quality checks throughout the shift and record them.
Team player, Safety conscious, Work independently, Strong communication, Ownership of equipment, Interpersonal skills
